name: The Walk to the Rave
description:
You are on the way to a underground tunnel rave in Russia, tripping on psychedelic drugs and struggling to distinguish between hallucination and reality. It seems like the main rave location is a lost factory, but getting there is not easy. Can you reach the party while staying conscious, or will you fall to your own imagination?

A short indie horror game made for learning unity. You can expect a short but tense adventure.
